Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Human peptide YY (PYY, natural AMPs; neuropeptide; primates, mammals, animals; UCLL1c; XXA)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis revealed sequence most similar tofrog skin-PYY.Activity: Active against A. simii (MIC 15 ug/ml), C. albicans (25 ug/ml), and C. neoformans (MIC 25 ug/ml).Structure: NMR found a helical structure for residues 13-31 in water (at pH 4.6, 25oC).You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB.Entry history: The original Plasticin ANCKF (XXA), Synthetic analog of natural peptide ANC, has been replaced. The sequence has been updated based on cuurent human PYY. 5/2020. Updated 5/2020; 8/2023
Literature Information.Author: Vouldoukis I, Shai Y, Nicolas P, Mor A.1996
Literature Information.Title: Broad Spectrum Antibiotic Activity of the skin-PYY
